[{"url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y0-LwK9Ni9U", "title": "18 BEST Local Japanese CHEAP EATS in Tokyo Japan - YouTube", "content": "18 BEST Local Japanese CHEAP EATS in Tokyo Japan

4290000 subscribers

In this video, I'll take you on a culinary journey through 18 of the best budget-friendly eateries I found in Tokyo, Japan. From savory ramen to sweet treats, discover where you can enjoy delicious meals that are kind to your wallet. 

#TokyoEats #CheapEats #JapaneseFood #TravelJapan #FoodieTravel #BudgetTravel #TokyoFoodTour

Restaurants:
Jimbocho Meat Center
Address: Japan, 〒101-0051 Tokyo, Chiyoda City, Kanda Jinbocho, 2 Chome−１６
Niigata Katsudon Tarekatsu Honten
Address: 2 Chome-8-9 Nishikanda, Chiyoda City, Tokyo 101-0065, Japan
Sushi at Nakano Broadway
Address: 5 Chome-52-15 Nakano, Nakano City, Tokyo 164-0001, Japan
Bonito Breakfast at Katsuo Shokudo
Address: B1, 7−12 GranDuo, Uguisudanicho Shibuya City 150-0032
Ramen at Fūunji
Address: Japan, 〒151-0053 Tokyo, Shibuya City, Yoyogi, 2 Chome−14−3 北斗第一ビル １F
Mapo Tofu at Chinkashisai Shinjukuten
Address: Japan, 〒151-0053 Tokyo, Shibuya City, Yoyogi, 2 Chome−15−9 加瀬ビル １Ｆ
TRUFFLE & BREAD
Address: 2 Chome-1-6 Miyoshi, Koto City, Tokyo 135-0022, Japan
Curry and Coffee at Raisukarē Manten
Address: Japan, 〒101-0051 Tokyo, Chiyoda City, Kanda Jinbocho, 1 Chome−５４
Udon Maruka
Address: Japan, 〒101-0052 Tokyo, Chiyoda City, Kanda Ogawamachi, 3 Chome−１６−1 ニュー駿河台ビル 1F
Jimbocho Yakisoba Mikasa
Address: Japan, 〒101-0051 Tokyo, Chiyoda City, Kanda Jinbocho, 2 Chome−２４−3
Fried Sandwich at Age.3
Address: Sugiura Building 1F, 1-24-11 Ginza, Chuo-ku, Tokyo
Approximately 3 minutes walk from Tokyo Metro Yurakucho Line/Ginza-itchome Station
中華居酒屋 超兄貴 Chinese Buffet
Address: Japan, 〒105-0004 Tokyo, Minato City, Shinbashi, 4 Chome−10−2 相鉄フレッサイン烏森口 2階A号室
Butadaigaku
Address: New Shinbashi Bldg 1F, 2-16-1 Shinbashi, Minato-ku
Tokyo
Standing Sushi at Sushi Cho
Address: 3-10-9, Tsukiji, Chuo 104-0045 Tokyo Prefecture
Gyūdon at Kitsuneya
Address: 4 Chome-9-12 Tsukiji, Chuo City, Tokyo 104-0045, Japan
Pasta at Tadokoro Shokuhin
Address: 4 Chome-9-11 Tsukiji, Chuo City, Tokyo 104-0045, Japan
Kamatama Chukasoba Napoleonken
Address: 8-2-1 Nishikamata, Ota 144-0051 Tokyo Prefecture
Oden Aocho
Address: Japan, 〒130-0022 Tokyo, Sumida City, Kotobashi, 3 Chome−11−3 ソシアル錦糸町ビル 4F

summary: This response contains information from three sources regarding cheap eats in Tokyo.  A YouTube video ("18 BEST Local Japanese CHEAP EATS in Tokyo Japan") by Strictly Dumpling provides a list of 18 budget-friendly restaurants with addresses.  A blog post ("Cheap eats in Tokyo (with map)") from Travel Breathe Repeat offers additional recommendations and images.  Finally, a TripAdvisor page ("THE 10 BEST Cheap Eats in Tokyo") lists highly-rated budget-friendly restaurants.  Note that one source is a large output and has not been summarized.
